bibl.title: The Mint of Pelusium.
bibl.note: The 9 different types known to us possess the Alexandrian flavour but were issued in Pelusium proper for local use as small change, mainly during and following the years of Trajan and Hadrian.
bibl.seg: Meshorer Yaakov, The Mint of Pelusium.
The 9 different types known to us possess the Alexandrian flavour but were issued in Pelusium proper for local use as small change, mainly during and following the years of Trajan and Hadrian.
